name: Sohlepse
description:
Sohlepse is a puzzle-platform game that uses reflections to provide control of more than one character with the same commands.

This can be done in parallel (both characters move at the same time) or sequentially (the same sequence of movements of one character is repeated as you move the other character).

Each stage will present different obstacles that will force you to make creative use of your reflections to overcome them.
